name: HOOP LOOP (itch)
description:
BEEP-BOOP HOOP-LOOP You play as a series of basket-bots trying to shoot some hoops. Use your brothers as platforms to get to through each next level. You can select different basket-bots that can transform into different platforms to help you get through more complicated levels. Make sure to collect all the gears to unlock a secret level!

- From the Indie Studio Team Plum brings you.. HOOP LOOP

(this is our first game btw)
